answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
The City of Woodinville, WA, has a brochure that includes tips for a successful sale and a sample sign at http://www.ci.woodinville.wa.us/Documents/Work/Garage%20Sale%20Sign%20brochure.pdf
If you develop one, please share it!

answers.author: Scott Neils
answers.text:
We had a lively discussion at Council about this issue a while back. The Council finally decided to implement a Garage Sale Ordinance that required only City-Issued signs be used. For more information, see
http://www.cowtx.org/main/garagesales.htm

author: Jerene Watson
text: Do you have a program of registration for yard sales or some mechanism where your city promotes compliance with sign code, such as providing free signs for yard sales?
title: Yard Sale Signs
